caption.p: Currently listed trials (June 30, 2020) on clinicaltrial.gov with experimental anticoagulation intervention in COVID-19 infection

tr.td: Anticoagulation in patients suffering from COVID-19 disease, The ANTI-CO Trial
RCT of anticoagulation with bivalirudin vs. SOC heparin in patients on invasive ventilation
PaO2/FiO2 (P/F) ratio used as surrogate marker for oxygenation
Coagulopathy of COVID 19: A pragmatic Randomized Controlled Trial of Therapeutic Anticoagulation Versus Standard Care
RCT of therapeutic heparin anticoagulation vs. SOC in patients with elevated D-dimer
Outcome of ICU admission, invasive and non-invasive ventilation, or all-cause death up to 28 days
InterMediate ProphylACTic Versus Therapeutic Dose Anticoagulation in Critically Ill patients with CVID-19—A Prospective Randomized Study (The IMPACT Trial)
Weil Cornell Medicine, New York, USA
RCT of therapeutic (heparin or argatroban) vs. intermediate-dose heparin anticoagulation prophylaxis
A Randomized Trial of Anticoagulation Strategies in COVID-19
RCT of high-dose vs. low-dose enoxaparin prophylaxis in patients with elevated D-dimer
All-cause 1-year mortality and incidence of any thrombosis in 21 days
Effect of Anticoagulation therapy on clinical outcomes in COVID-19
RCT of rivaroxaban vs. SOC heparin prophylaxis
Any thrombosis, all-cause mortality, or intubation at 35 days post randomization
Safety and Efficacy of Therapeutic Anticoagulation on Clinical Outcomes in Hospitalized Patients With COVID-19
RCT of therapeutic anticoagulation vs. SOC heparin anticoagulation
All-cause mortality, any thrombosis, major bleeding at 12 weeks post randomization
Intermediate or Prophylactic-Dose Anticoagulation for Venous or Arterial Thromboembolism in Severe COVID-19 (IMPROVE-COVID)
Columbia University Medical Center, New York, USA
RCT of intermediate-dose vs. prophylactic dose of heparin
Any thrombosis within 30 days or discharge from ICU
Preventing COVID-19 Complications With Low- and High-dose Anticoagulation
RCT of therapeutic vs. prophylactic anticoagulation with heparin
Any thrombosis, DIC, all-cause mortality within 30 days
Trial Evaluating Efficacy and Safety of Anticoagulation in patients with COVID-19 Infection, nested in the Corimmuno-19 Cohort
RCT of therapeutic tinzaparin or unfractionated heparin with SOC heparin prophylaxis
Full Dose Heparin vs. Prophylactic Or Intermediate Dose Heparin in High-Risk COVID-19 Patients
RCT of full dose vs. prophylactic or intermediate-dose low molecular weight heparin prophylaxis
Any thrombosis and all-cause mortality at 30 days
Full Anticoagulation Versus Prophylaxis in COVID-19: COALIZAO ACTION Trial
RCT of therapeutic anticoagulation with rivaroxaban or enoxaparin vs. prophylactic enoxaparin
Composite endpoint of mortality, number of days alive, stay in hospital, in oxygen, at the end of 30 days
A Pragmatic Randomized Controlled Trial of Therapeutic Anticoagulation Versus Standard Care as a Rapid Response to COVID-19 Pandemic
RCT of therapeutic enoxaparin vs. SOC heparin prophylaxis in patients with low oxygen saturation
Composite outcome of ICU admission, invasive and non-invasive ventilation and all cause death up to 28 days
RCT of standard-dose vs. intermediate-dose enoxaparin prophylaxis
Johns Hopkins All Children's Hospital, Saint Petersburg, FL, USA
Single group assignment of twice-daily enoxaparin prophylaxis
Safety of enoxaparin, fatal bleeding, any major bleeding within 30 days
Prevention of Arteriovenous Thrombotic Events in Critically-Ill COVID-19 Patients Trial
RCT of full dose or prophylactic dose heparin with or without clopidogrel
Any thrombosis at 28 days post randomization
Antithrombotic Therapy to Ameliorate Complications of COVID-19 (ATTACC)
RCT of therapeutic dose vs. prophylactic dose heparin anticoagulation
Ordinal endpoint of no ventilation or invasive ventilation or death
Anticoagulant Therapy and 28-days Mortality in Critically Ill COVID-19 Patients
South General Hospital, Stockholm, Stockholms Län, Sweden
Retrospective observational study of conventional, double dose, and therapeutic anticoagulation with tinzaparin or dalteparin
Preventing Cardiac Complication of COVID-19 Disease With Early Acute Coronary Syndrome Therapy: A Randomised Controlled Trial
RCT of aspirin or clopidogrel or rivaroxaban with atorvastatin and omeprazole
All-cause mortality at 30 days after admission
European/Euro-ELSO Survey on Adult and Neonatal/ Pediatric COVID-19 Patients in ECMO
Multiple (97) centers in Europe, Russia, and Israel

table-wrap-foot.p: DIC disseminated intravascular coagulation, ECMO extracorporeal membrane oxygenation, ICU intensive care unit, RCT randomised controlled trial, SOC standard of care, TIMI thrombolysis and myocardial infarction
